content:
Mosha chamachoraa-pedakadrshdaantam
Mariyaame! Shlommo-jeevajalatthin munkuriyaam
Roohaa than shoshappaa shlom
aishaayan daaveeduktham
Sthhiramaam purame shlommo nin
Udaratthee-nnudayam cheytheeshan.

Slee-baayenti, saatthaanodelppaan
Sahadenmaar chennu-khadgatthaal mrthiyettorum
Theeyaal venneeraayorum
Poril kaattiya veeryatthaal
Saatthaan kopaakulanaayi
Nalkuka thal praarththhanayaal punyam.

Naathhaa! Nin meyyum -rakthavumettoraam
mrthare siddharkkaay-pande sajeekrthamaakum
Pantikkanpo-dirutthaname.
Nin sharane maranam poondor
ninne ettoraamavare
Elkkaname - thaathangkal neeyum

Janani, parishuddha-praarththhanayaal naathhaa!
Punyam nyangallkkum vigatharkkum nalka.

Mariyaamin smaranam-varadaayakamaaka
Thal praarththhana nyangall-kkaathmaavinu kotta.

Parishuddha shleehaa-nibi, sahadenmaare!
Yaachippin krpaye-nyangallkkaayu ningall.

Nin sharane mrtharaam-thaatha sahodararil
Choriyaname moda-ppanineeren naathhaa!

Susmrthi jananikkum-vishruthi siddharkkum
Jeevan vigatharkkum-cherppone! Sthothram!

Janani, parishuddha-praarththhanayaal naathhaa!
Punyam nyangallkkum-vigatharkkum nalka.
Vaayanakkaaran:- neethimaanmaarude koodaaratthil /mahatthvatthinteyum, rakshayudeyum shabdam ennu /daaveedu mukhaantaram parishuddharoohaa-paadi.
